Related repos

  • deep time series models library for forecasting, imputation, anomaly detection, and classification
  • Multi-resolution transformer model for time series forecasting
  • library for post-training and fine-tuning transformer models with SFT, PPO, DPO, and more
  • transformers library for working with machine learning models
  • Pretrained models for time series forecasting using language model architectures
  • pretrained model for time-series forecasting from Google Research
  • Nanotron: minimalistic library for pretraining transformer models with simple API and scalable parallelism
  • open source app to run, train, and tune large language models on your computer
  • cheatsheet and study guide for transformers and large language models
  • Using pretrained language models to tackle all kinds of time series analysis, from forecasting to anomaly detection
